message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV. 

The paper discusses the characteristics of environments that can support the training and evaluation of lifelong reinforcement learning agents, which falls under the field of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also reviews existing environments from this perspective, which is related to machine learning (cs.LG) and robotics (cs.RO). The concept of lifelong learning is also relevant to systems and control (cs.SY). Finally, the paper proposes recommendations for devising suitable environments in the future, which could involve computer vision (cs.CV) techniques for creating realistic and diverse environments.
